long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A one-click "magic", extension to organize tabs.  Automatically create TabGroups for tabs with the same domains, sort within by URL and close duplicates.  

I keep a ridiculous number of tabs open and this is my attempt to bring some order to the chaos.  It is currently strongly opinionated (ie mine) but would love to get some feedback and perhaps add some configuration options over time.
